channel.title: black on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in black on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-25
item.description: Pfizer trials new pill that could stop early-stage Covid in its tracks (3 minute read) Pfizer has started stage one clinical trials on an oral pill designed to be an early intervention for Covid-19.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-03
item.description: Google proposes new campus billed as a ’neighborhood’ with homes and shops (1 minute read) Google has unveiled plans to build a new corporate campus in Mountain View, California.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-03
item.description: LG set to release ‘rollable’ phone next year (4 minute read) LG Electronics will launch a ‘rollable’ smartphone in early 2021.
